description: a(n) = 2*phi(n) if n composite, or 2*phi(n) - (A000120(n)-1) if n prime, where phi = A000010, Euler's totient function.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum A005187(n) x^n = Sum a(n)*x^n/(1-x^n).
prog: (Haskell)a035532 1 = 1a035532 n = if a010051' n == 0 then phi2 else phi2 - a000120 n + 1            where phi2 = 2 * a000010 n-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 04 2015
author: Daniele Parisse (daniele.parisse(AT)m.dasa.de)
